duties_responsibilities.duty: Designing and developing NLP applications for medical entity extraction and text mining.
Designing Database to store NLP entities and relationship.
Using effective text representation techniques and classification algorithms.
Studying and transforming data science prototypes.
Designing end to end java applications.
Finding and implementing the right algorithms and tools for NLP tasks.
Performing statistical analysis of results and refining models.
Extending ML libraries and frameworks to apply in NLP tasks.
Remaining updated in the rapidly changing field of machine learning.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
